about_the_game:
Welcome to Africa!



After your plane crashes, You find yourself in one of the largest abandoned tourist locations in South Africa. Build, Craft, and create your character while combatting the intense heat of the Kalahari Desert in this upcoming realistic open-world survival simulation game.

Challenges

You are dropped into the harsh Kalahari Desert where you will need to adapt to this new environment. Players will face off against large predators and the devastating heat of the African sun while managing player vitals such as hunger and fatigue.



Exploration

Players will encounter many points of interest while exploring the Kalahari, These may include small locations such as abandoned camps or larger locations such as the wide range of abandoned theme parks and tourist attractions located around the desert.



Cooking

Players will need to forage plants and hunt animals for food, medicine or buff items which can be used to gain statistical benefits. Cooking items such as meat, herbs or spices found can be brought to a campfire where they can be combined into the perfect safari meal.



Custom Building System

Players will need to setup camps and bases by harvesting materials such as logs, sticks and stones found around the map, These materials are combined to create buildings such as foundations or walls including functional structures such as water collectors and transporters, campfires or storage devices. Kalahari's End attempts to provide users with as little building limitations as possible to allow players to express their true creativity utilizing the building system.



Combat

Along with the harsh conditions of the Kalahari, players will face off against all sorts of animals, Some of which want a tasty snack while others just want you off their territory. Craft and customize weapon parts and visuals using scrap found all over the map to ensure that you have sufficient firepower for every situation while looking the part.



Great Tourist Location!

While considering the harsh components of the Kalahari, It is also important to recognize the leisure activities provided such as a nice swim followed by an ice cold drink under the warm sun. The Kalahari can be the perfect tourist location if one knows their environment.



Realistic Healing Animations

Players will encounter all sorts of ailments and injuries in their stay at the Kalahari, Some including only small wounds or cuts while other may include more painful and urgent injuries such as fractured bones or deep cuts. Players will need to ensure that they have the correct medical herbs or equipment to deal with any situation they may encounter.



Key Features

  • Base building, Chop trees and harvest materials to build your perfect safari base.
  • Cooking, Find and combine food items such as meat, herbs and spices to make various African delicacies.
  • Temperature effects, Players will face harsh temperatures such as heatstroke throughout the day and hypothermia in the cold nights.
  • Character customization, Players are allowed to customize almost every aspect of their player appearance including Gender, Race and apparel items such as wrist bands, shoes and leg items.
  • Crafting, Scrap and crafting materials can be found around the map which are used to create custom weapons and tools.
  • Pets, Players can gain the trust of animals encountered in the wild which will help the player with activities such as foraging or hunting.
  • Realistic healing, To increase the realism for Kalahari's End, Players will experience a range of realistic injuries ranging from small cuts to large lacerations.

Will you be able to survive the Kalahari?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Drive Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Drive Recommended
